languages.text: {n}Друкари склоняется к вам, его голос обращается в ядовитую патоку, а когти перчатки касаются вашего подбородка.{/n} "Но я хорошо подготовил тебя. Ты пол{mf|он|на} решимости и жажды страданий... о да, ты найдешь упоение в том, через что пройдешь. Ты уже выш{mf|ел|ла} за рамки убогой морали мон-кай. Ты постиг{mf||ла} то, что не дано другим. Победишь ли ты или падешь — ты сделаешь это с пониманием, которое недоступно твоему виду".

{n}Marazhai cups your chin with a clawed glove, pouring sweet words like deadly poison into your ear:{/n} "But I have trained you well. You are determined and hungry for suffering... Oh yes, you will find rapture in what you are about to endure. You have already transcended the boundaries of stunted mon-keigh morality. You understand what others do not. Whether you triumph or fall, you will do so with an understanding that is beyond the grasp of your kind."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари склоняется к вам, его голос обращается в ядовитую патоку, а когти перчатки касаются вашего подбородка.{/n} "Но я хорошо подготовил тебя. Ты пол{mf|он|на} решимости и жажды страданий... о да, ты найдешь упоение в том, через что пройдешь. Ты уже выш{mf|ел|ла} за рамки убогой морали мон-кай. Ты постиг{mf||ла} то, что не дано другим. Победишь ли ты или падешь — ты сделаешь это с пониманием, которое недоступно твоему виду".

Oh yes, you will find rapture in what you are about to go through. You have already transcended the boundaries of mon-keigh's stunted morality. You understand what others do not. Whether you triumph or fall, you will do so with an understanding that is beyond the reach of your kin."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋用带着利爪的手甲托住你的下巴，甜言蜜语灌入了你的耳朵，仿佛致命的毒药一样。{/n}“不过，我把你训练得很好。你意志坚定，渴望痛苦……噢，是啊，你会在忍受的痛苦中找到狂喜。你已经超越了猴子愚蠢的道德底线，你懂得其他人不懂的东西。无论是成功还是失败，你都会带着超越你们同类的视野，面对注定的结局。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai cups your chin with a clawed glove, pouring sweet words like deadly poison into your ear:{/n} "But I have trained you well. You are determined and hungry for suffering... Oh yes, you will find rapture in what you are about to endure. You have already transcended the boundaries of stunted mon-keigh morality. You understand what others do not. Whether you triumph or fall, you will do so with an understanding that is beyond the grasp of your kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋用带着利爪的手甲托住你的下巴，甜言蜜语灌入了你的耳朵，仿佛致命的毒药一样。{/n}“不过，我把你训练得很好。你意志坚定，渴望痛苦……噢，是啊，你会在忍受的痛苦中找到狂喜。你已经超越了猴子愚蠢的道德底线，你懂得其他人不懂的东西。无论是成功还是失败，你都会带着超越你们同类的视野，面对注定的结局。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai coloca su mano enguantada bajo tu barbilla, vertiendo palabras dulces como el veneno en tus oídos:{/n} «Pero te he entrenado bien. Tienes determinación y sed de sufrimiento... Oh, sí, encontrarás el placer en lo que estás a punto de soportar. Ya has trascendido los límites de la estancada moralidad mon-keigh. Entiendes lo que otros jamás podrán. Triunfes o caigas, lo harás con una comprensión muy superior a la del resto de tu especie».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai cups your chin with a clawed glove, pouring sweet words like deadly poison into your ear:{/n} "But I have trained you well. You are determined and hungry for suffering... Oh yes, you will find rapture in what you are about to endure. You have already transcended the boundaries of stunted mon-keigh morality. You understand what others do not. Whether you triumph or fall, you will do so with an understanding that is beyond the grasp of your kind."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは爪のある手袋をはめた手であなたの顎を持ち上げると、甘い言葉を猛毒のように耳のそばで囁く。{/n}「だが、お前をよく訓練してやった。お前は真剣で、苦しみに飢えている…ああ、そうだ。これから敬虔することにも喜びを見出すだろうよ。お前は、ちっこいままのモン＝ケイの境界を超越しているし、他の奴らが理解できないことを理解している。勝とうが負けようが、お前のような種族には理解できないことを理解して、それを実行するんだろうな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai cups your chin with a clawed glove, pouring sweet words like deadly poison into your ear:{/n} "But I have trained you well. You are determined and hungry for suffering... Oh yes, you will find rapture in what you are about to endure. You have already transcended the boundaries of stunted mon-keigh morality. You understand what others do not. Whether you triumph or fall, you will do so with an understanding that is beyond the grasp of your kind."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai nimmt sanft dein Hand in seine mit einem klauenbewerten Handschuh bekleidete Hand und flüstert dir Worte wie tödliches Gift ins Ohr:{/n} "Aber ich habe Euch gut ausgebildet. Ihr seid entschlossen und giert nach Leid ... Oh ja, Ihr werdet in dem, was Ihr bald erdulden müsst, wahre Entrückung finden. Ihr habt die Grenzen der verkümmerten Moral der Chem-Pan-Sey bereits hinter Euch gelassen. Ihr versteht, was andere nicht verstehen. Ob Ihr triumphiert oder fallt, Ihr werdet es mit einem Verständnis tun, das Euresgleichen nicht vergönnt ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai cups your chin with a clawed glove, pouring sweet words like deadly poison into your ear:{/n} "But I have trained you well. You are determined and hungry for suffering... Oh yes, you will find rapture in what you are about to endure. You have already transcended the boundaries of stunted mon-keigh morality. You understand what others do not. Whether you triumph or fall, you will do so with an understanding that is beyond the grasp of your kind."

Ihr seid entschlossen und giert nach Leid ... Oh ja, Ihr werdet in dem, was Ihr bald erdulden müsst, wahre Entrückung finden. Ihr habt die Grenzen der verkümmerten Moral der Chem-Pan-Sey bereits hinter Euch gelassen. Ihr versteht, was andere nicht verstehen. Ob Ihr triumphiert oder fallt, Ihr werdet es mit einem Verständnis tun, das Euresgleichen nicht vergönnt ist."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai saisit votre menton dans son gant griffu et vous susurre à l'oreille des mots suaves, semblables à un poison mortel :{/n} « Mais je vous ai bien {mf|dressé|dressée}. Votre détermination n'a d'égale que votre soif de souffrance... Oh oui, vous trouverez l'extase dans l'épreuve qui vous attend. Vous avez déjà transcendé les limites de la morale par trop restrictive des mon-keigh et vous saisissez pleinement ce qui dépasse la plupart de vos congénères. Que vous triomphiez ou que vous tombiez, vous le ferez avec une compréhension inaccessible au commun des mortels. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai cups your chin with a clawed glove, pouring sweet words like deadly poison into your ear:{/n} "But I have trained you well. You are determined and hungry for suffering... Oh yes, you will find rapture in what you are about to endure. You have already transcended the boundaries of stunted mon-keigh morality. You understand what others do not. Whether you triumph or fall, you will do so with an understanding that is beyond the grasp of your kind."

Votre détermination n'a d'égale que votre soif de souffrance... Oh oui, vous trouverez l'extase dans l'épreuve qui vous attend. Vous avez déjà transcendé les limites de la morale par trop restrictive des mon-keigh et vous saisissez pleinement ce qui dépasse la plupart de vos congénères. Que vous triomphiez ou que vous tombiez, vous le ferez avec une compréhension inaccessible au commun des mortels. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, pençeli bir eldivenle çeneni kavrıyor ve kulaklarını ölümcül bir zehir gibi hissettiren tatlı sözcüklerle dolduruyor.{/n} "Seni iyi eğittim. Kararlısın ve acıya açsın... Katlanman gerekecek şeyler sana şevk verecek. Şimdiden ilkel mon-keigh ahlakının sınırlarının ötesine geçtin. Başkalarının anlayamadığın şeyleri anlıyorsun. Başarılı da olsan, hezimetle de karşılaşsan bunu türünün kavrayışının çok ötesindeki bir zihniyetle yapacaksın."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai cups your chin with a clawed glove, pouring sweet words like deadly poison into your ear:{/n} "But I have trained you well. You are determined and hungry for suffering... Oh yes, you will find rapture in what you are about to endure. You have already transcended the boundaries of stunted mon-keigh morality. You understand what others do not. Whether you triumph or fall, you will do so with an understanding that is beyond the grasp of your kind."
